thag2.43:1.2: like horses tamed by a charioteer?
thag2.43:1.3: Who has abandoned conceit and defilements,
thag2.43:1.4: becoming such that even the gods envy them?
thag2.43:2.2: like horses tamed by a charioteer.
thag2.43:2.3: I have abandoned conceit and defilements,
thag2.43:2.4: becoming such that even the gods envy me.
